sentence.Network_en: Bordeaux is on the main Paris-Madrid line so there are frequent trains.
sentence.Network_cn: 波尔多位于巴黎到马德里的铁路主干线上，来往列车频繁。

sentence.Network_en: The high-speed train service is planned to extend from Paris to Bordeaux.
sentence.Network_cn: 高铁拟从巴黎延伸至波尔多。

sentence.Network_en: Rob Harmeling won the sprint in Bordeaux.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗布·哈梅林在波尔多获得短跑冠军。

...文名称（cabenet franc）卡伯纳·佛朗。别名卡门耐特、原种解百纳。原产法国，是法国波尔多三大红葡萄品种之一，是法国波尔多（bordeaux）及罗亚河区（loire）古老的酿酒品种，是赤霞珠、蛇龙珠的姊妹品种。我国最早是1892年由西欧引入山.

means.word_mean: 1. a port city in southwestern France; a major center of the wine trade
2. any of several red or white wines produced around Bordeaux, France or wines resembling them
